Name: roleid
Description: id of a role that has a member

Name: member
Description: id of a role that is a member of roleid

Name: grantor
Description: id of the role that granted this membership

Name: admin_option
Description: true if member can grant membership in roleid to others

Name: inherit_option
Description: true if the member automatically inherits the privileges of the granted role

Name: set_option
Description: true if the member can set role to the granted role
